      • hasSpace

        public static boolean hasSpace(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory i)
        Does the inventory have any space (empty slots)
        Parameters:
        i - the inventory
        Returns:
        true if it has at least one slot empty

      • hasSpace

        public static boolean hasSpace(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory i,
                               int slots)
        Does the inventory have a given amount of empty space (or more)
        Parameters:
        i - the inventory
        slots - the slots needed empty
        Returns:
        true if it has more than or enough empty slots

      • getActualContents

        public static ninja.bytecode.shuriken.collections.KList<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> getActualContents(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory i)
        Get the ACTUAL contents in this inventory. Meaning no elements in the list are null, or just plain air
        Parameters:
        i - the inventory
        Returns:
        the ACTUAL contents

      • hasSpace

        public static boolean hasSpace(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory i,
                               org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Does the inventory have space for the given item
        Parameters:
        i - the inventory
        item - the item
        Returns:
        returns true if either there is enough empty slots to fill it (amt / maxStackSize) OR the item can be merged with an existing item, else false.
